title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
MSConvert_check — MSConvert_check
code: MSConvert_check()  msConvertDir(raw.path, format.to = "mzML")  msConvert2mzML(   raw.files,   mzML.files,   BPPARAM = BiocParallel::SnowParam(workers = parallel::detectCores() - 1) )  MSConvert_Download(save_path = tempdir())  MSConvert_Deploy(pwiz.bz = MSConvert_Download())
